Summary: a group of 10 lights traving south over the organ moutains that change there configurations into many different shapes like circles and such
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Las Cruces
There were no other sightings in Las Cruces on or around July 3rd 2013
divs: Sighting Detailswas not witnessed by myself... But by at least 5 people.. A line of 10 lights flying over the Organ mountains in Las Cruces NM on 7-3-13 about 10:30PM (this would be the white sands missle range area behind these mountains) that were observed for about 5 mintues traving south and changing configurations from cicles to v shapes and several others..
